description: Danny Gunn and Michael DelRay head out on their road trip journey to find Danny's stepfather. They stop for a rest in a hotel parking lot and soon find out you don't necessarily need money for a room. The two young men put on a nasty sex show for the big, burly, tattooed Dane Stewart. It's Soon turns into a fat cock sucking, ass banging, cum drenched three-way!
title: Overnight Stay
